desc: We are a growing healthy vending service company and we are in need of of someone to market our free vending service to local businesses.I need 10 appointments to start.Your responsibility will include calling into local sport and schools and various retail locations to secure placement for our vending machines. Healthy needs to make sense for our customers.You won't be selling anything since our service is 100% free to the customer. You just have to find out who in the company is in charge of the vending service and ask them if they want our free vending machine & service. If they are interested, you just schedule a time for us to go there and inspect the location.Commission is $40 per appointment and an additional $60 if we put a machine there.We provide 1 types of machines: Combo Snacks and drinks machineI have uploaded pictures of our vending machines.Requirements:1. desc: The aim is to have a collection of 4 scripts/files which i will then be integrated into a wordpress plugin by myself:script/file 1: On run will obtain necessary authorisation for the Facebook API and return the token, ad account id, etc needed to make API calls for data (these variables will be stored to a database on a central server)script/file 2: On run will use the previously obtained data from file 1 (via the database) to query the Facebook API to find the ad spend total of the previous day and return the valuescript/file 3: On run will obtain necessary authorisation for the Google Adwords API and return the token, ad account id, etc needed to make API calls for data (these variables will be stored to a database on a central server)script/file 4: On run will use the previously obtained data from file 3 (via the database) to query the Google Adwords API to find the ad spend total of the previous day and return the valueNOTE: These scripts will be built into a wordpress plugin and therefore used with multiple users facebook and google accounts so the authorisation must be such that this isnt a problem. As the scripts themselves will always be run from 1 website there will be no issue with varified oauth urls however the facebook and google api apps setup must allow for many end users to auth against the app.Additionally the completed scripts will rely on sdks so these should be included in the final product.The successful developer should have great experience with both facebook and google apis and be able to choose the most suitable api methods to meet the plugin setup these scripts will be used as.My budget is very limited so price is a huge factor but more importantly the right developer with the correct skills and understanding of the project is paramount.I do not need you to develop a wordpress plugin just 4 scripts that i will then use the code and put into a plugin i already have in development by myself.
title: Ad Spend Data Retrieval via API - Facebook Ads and Google Adwords

desc: We are an e-commerce based business specializing in gift baskets filled with craft beer and gourmet snacks. A large portion of our business is from corporate buyers sending gifts to clients or prospects. With the holiday season approaching, many corporate buyers send traditional gift baskets, but are not aware that they can send a basket filled with highly rated craft beer. With the popularity of craft beer on the rise, our beer gift baskets are very appealing to prospective buyers if they know it is an option. We are seeking an energetic salesperson with the ability to connect with the appropriate gift buyer for corporate accounts.  Our current customers cover a broad range of industries -- from major tech companies like Google, Facebook and LinkedIn to financial companies such as Goldman Sachs and Edward Jones, there is tremendous opportunity for success as long as you can get in front of the right contact! Commission will be paid based on the gross amount of sales.
